titles.title: Permanency for Audio-Only Telehealth Act
Permanency for Audio-Only Telehealth Act
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to expand accessibility to certain telehealth services under the Medicare program.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary:
Permanency for Audio-Only Telehealth Act
This bill permanently expands Medicare coverage of telehealth services to include audio-only services and at-home evaluation and management services and mental and behavioral health services.
